text: We were chatting about this recently for Forms actually, but for simpler settings like notification recipients, captcha on/off, block domain providers, etc. In terms of adding/removing fields, I (personaly) can't wrap my head around how that would work because my understanding is that each form would want to put the fields in a slightly different location than the last (accounting for each of them having different structures). Do you have a good example of a tool that handles this kind of bulk edit well?
